Title: Reminds me of playing magic with my childhood friend. Neither of us had a great grasp on the rules a...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Reminds me of playing magic with my childhood friend. Neither of us had a great grasp on the rules and we'd argue for hours about cards. We'd make a lot of arguments like "X can't work like Y" because then there'd be no need for this clause on this other card.
